item.rtk.trowel.tooltip: Lays a line of blocks in the direction you're facing.;Put to the left of building blocks in inventory.;Shift-right click to change length.
item.rtk.hotplate.tooltip: Melts cobblestone into stone in a 3x3 pattern.
item.rtk.hotplateetched.tooltip: Melts and etches cobblestone and;stone into stone bricks in a 3x3 pattern.
item.rtk.needle.tooltip: Use on tent walls to pop them all at once.;Doesn't destroy main tent block.rtk.
item.rtk.endertoolbox.tooltip: Can hold many unstackable items.;Inventory can be accessed from any box similar to ender chest.
item.rtk.toolbelt.tooltip: Swaps to the most effective tool when breaking blocks.;Must be equipped on hotbar.
item.rtk.dolly.tooltip: Can pick up most blocks with an inventory.;Can also pick up monster spawners.
item.rtk.earthstrider.tooltip: Allows user to see and walk through stone.;Right click to toggle.
item.rtk.earthstrider_drained.tooltip: Repair with six diamonds and an Eye of Ender in a crafting table.
item.rtk.hotsword.tooltip: Deals heavy fire damage but cools off quickly.
item.rtk.eyeofnether.tooltip: Teleport to and from the nether instantly.
item.rtk.voidstrider.tooltip: Allows owner to traverse the void above and below the world.;Hold shift for more information.
item.rtk.voidstrider.tooltip2: The void above can be reached by travelling far above the overworld.;A passage to the void below may be opened by shift-right-clicking bedrock with an Earth Strider,; but will destroy it in the process.
item.rtk.stopwatch.tooltip: Right click to start timer.;Right click again to stop and see elapsed time.;Use on contrainers to measure gain/loss rates for items/fluids/energy.
item.rtk.inspectiontool.tooltip: Creative Item;Right click block with tile entity to view state.
item.rtk.squidhand.tooltip: Right clicks blocks in 3x3 pattern with item to the right in hotbar.
block.rtk.emergencytent.tooltip: An instant 9x9 for dire straits.;Right click to deploy.
block.rtk.tent.tooltip: A reusable tent.;Right click with 8 coal/charcoal to deploy.
block.rtk.diverstent.tooltip: Works under water!;Right click with 32 coal/charcoal to deploy.
block.rtk.endertent.tooltip: A magic tent which can retain its interior when picked up.;Right click with 16 ender pearls to deploy.
block.rtk.diversendertent.tooltip: Combines the Diver's Tent and Ender Tent.;Right click with 16 ender pearls to deploy.
block.rtk.levitator.tooltip: Emits a magic beam which pushes entities along.;Requires a redstone signal.
block.rtk.ultradispenser.tooltip: Right click to fire.;Shift right click to place.
block.rtk.fouriertransformer.tooltip: Sends and receives entities across redstone wires.;The receiver must be powered by redstone.;The sender must be given a redstone pulse.
